Name: Prickly Pear Mule
Ingredients: 37.5 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer
Instructions: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.
Review: Subtle pear with ginger spice. Fill the glass with ice and go easy on the ginger beer which can predominate and overpower the pear.
History: Created in 2002 by yours truly. See: Moscow Mule cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Prickly Pear Mule contains 246 calories
